Text: Thanks for this release - I always like to have the weigh-ins for these events, but it's been almost impossible to find anyone with a DL version (as opposed to people cut&paste the embed code for the UFC website silverlight stream that can't be DL'd with apps like Real Player, etc) for the past few events. The weigh-in for Vera Vs. Jones had some drama that I didn't get... but anyway, thanks again for this one!!
